שְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'- Hear יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD קוֹלִ֥י <S%H6963><s%> ko-Li with my voice אֶקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> 'ek-Ra, [when] I cry וְחָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> ve-chon-Ne-ni have mercy וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> va-'a-Ne-ni. also upon me and answer

לְךָ֤׀ le-Cha אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> Lib-bi my heart בַּקְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> bak-ke-Shu [When thou saidst] Seek פָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nai; ye my face אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha unto thee Thy face יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> 'a-vak-Kesh. will I seek
